name: Quintessence: The Blighted Venom
summary:
This was my first game project started back in 2006, 
and is rough around the edges. Also incomplete, at about 10 hours.
 (11 chapters out of 14 released so far, currently on a hiatus)

The genre of the story is adventure, drama, and fantasy. 
Instead of a synopsis, 
here is the opening of the written version of the game's story. 
While the scene is not directly implemented in-game, 
the events surrounding it are.
